question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love beauty, especially the grandeur of nature and art"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Art, aesthetics, and beauty don’t matter"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"How an object looks is very important to me"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not value beauty and art"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"In interior décor, attention to details such as patterned tiles or light fixtures really makes a lot of difference"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care a lot about the visual aspects of my surroundings, and notice beauty in environments around me"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care about carefully creating an attractive, functional and pleasing environment in my surroundings"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find aesthetics and artistry to be of great personal importance"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Aesthetics is unimportant or overrated"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hardly ever pay attention to the aesthetic look of things"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't pay much attention to the appearance or how things are designed"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think it's very important for things to have good taste, design, and aesthetic appeal"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Decor should be purely practical"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care deeply about the aesthetics (look and style) of the things I buy, such as appliances, cars, clothing, and so on"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It does not matter to me if my environment is aesthetically displeasing"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Color and style are extremely important when it comes to the objects that I own, especially when it comes to my personal appearance"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't notice particularly how things look"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Art appreciation and beauty form an essential part of my life"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t care much about art, literature or music"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not place a strong value on beauty and form"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I like movies and works of art with elegant and graceful styles"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I spend very little time thinking about beauty, aesthetics, or art"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Art and beauty are an integral part of life"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Artistic appreciation is not an important thing in life"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think art and beauty are among the greatest parts of the human experience"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I truly care about beauty in my environment, even small things that others might not notice"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I like to arrange my living spaces to look attractive and pleasing"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer surroundings that are aesthetically pleasing"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Architecture should be visually appealing and well designed"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love style, beauty and form in everything"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find art, beauty, and aesthetics less interesting and significant than many others do"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"aesthetic appeal isn’t critical for products and architecture"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Having something beautiful in my surroundings is not important to me"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find certain compositions, designs, and patterns unusually pleasing to look at"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It's not important that the designs for things like cars or electronics are well designed"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It’s not important to surround myself with things that are beautiful and attractive"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care deeply about beauty and form in the manmade objects around me"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is little lasting value in things of beauty"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not put much emphasis on beauty or form"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Design and/or aesthetics matter to me when I make a choice"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Minute details matter; I spend a lot of time creating the precise effect I want to achieve"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have well-defined tastes regarding aesthetics and I know what looks good to me"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't have very strong preferences regarding aesthetic aspects of things"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Artistry and the way things look does not affect my evaluation"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t pay much attention to how things look"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't care much about the look or aesthetics of objects and products"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Art doesn’t matter; it’s a waste of time"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"An item's style or form matters greatly to me; an ugly mug may keep the coffee hot, but it shouldn't go in my cupboard"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t have strong feelings about the design of my environment"

Choices:
 (A) No
 (B) Yes

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I want surroundings that are aesthetically pleasing"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No
